description: Try our easy to follow Pork & Chorizo Meatballs With Black Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork & Chorizo Meatballs With Black Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g fresh chorizo sausages, skins removed, finely chopped
1 cup coriander leaves (plus extra leaves to serve)
1 slice white bread, crusts removed (cut into cubes)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease a large roasting tray with oil.
Combine tomatoes, salsa, beans and 1 tbs chipotle in a bowl. Season and set aside. Place bread and milk in a bowl and stand for 5 minutes.
Combine mince, chorizo, egg, bread mixture, coriander and remaining chipotle in a bowl. Season, then roll into 12 equal balls. Place on tray and bake for 25 minutes.
Preheat grill to high. Pour tomato mixture around meatballs and scatter over cheese. Grill for 7 minutes or until cheese has melted and is golden. Set aside for 5 minutes.
Scatter over extra coriander and jalapeño and serve with corn chips and sour cream.
